delay.description: Delay starting the sound, in milliseconds

fade-in.description: Fade-in time from 0 volume, in milliseconds

fade-out.description: Fade-out time to 0 volume, in milliseconds

loop.description: Whether to loop the sound until it is stopped

multiply-after.description: Indicates the number of instances of a sound event needed to apply the multiply overlap behavior

multiply-properties.description: Indicates the properties to multiply during a multiply overlap behavior.

note.description: Use this for any kind of comment

overlap-behavior.description: What to do if the sound is played more than once at the same time

sound-file.description: Relative path to the sound file to be played

sound-files.description: Array of relative paths to sound files, one will be selected at random

type.description: Whether the sound is a sound effect or background music

volume.description: Volume to play the sound at, from 0 to 1 (or overdriven up to 10)

additionalProperties.$comment: This means one or the other are required, but both together are forbidden
